DOC.brief_summary: The primary objectives of the study are: -To evaluate the long-term safety and tolerability of MT-1303 in subjects with moderate to severe active Crohn's Disease（CD）
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study of MT-1303 in Subjects With Crohn's Disease
DOC.criteria: The subject completed 14 week Treatment Period in the double blind MT1303E13 study as per Protocol. Permanent discontinuation of study medication prior to the end of treatment Visit in MT1303E13
